name: Psychoballs
description: A mind-boggling action-puzzler that requires a sharp wit and quick fingers.
minimum_requirements: Processor: Pentium II, 350 Mhz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 7.1 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Is your computer older than ten years? You should probably get a new computer before you consider more games. :)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 7.1 Storage: 150 MB available space
